name: upload-bom-dtrack-task
description: Upload a BOM file to Dependency Track platform.
author: Edouard Shaar

inputs.name: bomFilePath
inputs.label: BOM File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path where the BOM file is located. (e.g. 'directory/**/bom.xml').

inputs.name: dtrackProjId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The guid of the project in Dependency Track

inputs.name: dtrackURI
inputs.label: Dependency Track URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the Dependency Track platform

inputs.name: caFilePath
inputs.label: Trusted CA certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to PEM encoded CA certificate. This setting is used when Dependency Track is using a self-signed certificate or an internal CA provider for it's TLS configuration.

messages.FileNotFound: BOM file path is not a file: %s
messages.BOMUploadStarting: Starting BOM upload to Dependency Track at url: %s
messages.BOMUploadFailed: Uploading the BOM to Dependency Track Failed: %s
